text:
<!everyone> hey folks! we've got some great jobs to share today, but i first wanted to highlight some of the (many) great threads i've seen around lately.
• From: <@U01CW2WDEEP>: <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1641458516002400|What are your growth hacks for a blog which wants to scale 2x this year>?
• From <@UNA88V285>: <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1642009446097800|Should you create tangentially related content just to build links>?
• From <@U014RPS9DBK>: <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1642088500114500|How (or if?) your teams guard against plagiarism when outsourcing content>?
• From <@U01L7S9CVNG>: <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1641841960045000|"Is prioritizing the creation & distribution of TOFU, well-thought-out TL pieces the right way to start?"> And <@U02HG9U4JQG>, i really appreciated <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1641909684059900?thread_ts=1641841960.045000&cid=CJ7QQKJ73|your response> to that one. shoot me a DM with your email address and i'll send over a free audiobook credit. :slightly_smiling_face: 
• And lastly, <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJE3XC0H3/p1641917537026600|the thread on the salary survey was great>. if you haven't read the report yet, you can check it out here → *<https://superpath.co/blog/content-marketing-salary-report>*
---
okay, jobs!
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---

• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/211627-content-marketing-editor-animalz|Content Marketing Editor>
• Brief Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216957-director-digital-content-and-audience-growth-brief-media|Director, Digital Content & Audience Growth>

• Pinwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/212267-content-marketing-specialist-pinwheel|Content Marketing Specialist>

• Salesloft is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/211636-director-content-strategy-salesloft|Director, Content Strategy>
• Pitch is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/210972-copywriter-pitch|Copywriter> <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/207902-freelance-writer-torii|(:wave: @Aimee Millwood)>
• Propllr PR and Content Marketing is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/210605-b2b-content-marketing-manager-propllr-pr-and-content-marketing|B2B Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@U01CJKV4HE3> & <@U01P36DESHW>)
• Growth Plays is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/208591-content-strategy-operations-and-editorial-lead-growth-plays|Content Strategy Operations & Editorial Lead>
• <http://Draft.dev|Draft.dev> is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/205882-lead-editor-draftdev|Lead Editor>
• CloudApp is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202629-head-of-marketing-cloudapp|Head of Marketing>
• Megawatt is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/202037-b2b-tech-account-manager-and-strategist-megawatt|B2B Tech Account Manager and Strategist>
have a great weekend everyone!
:v: jimmy

text:
Just catching up here - great convo! I love the idea of a dedicated place to get more specific about salary. I'd be down to participate in that<@UJG9WTEKG>. I'm negotiating a raise right now, so it's something I've been actively thinking about haha.

One suggestion for future reports is including a breakdown of industry and company size. When I've talked about raises in the past with my company, one of the main pushbacks equates to "Sure, you can make $XXX if you're at a 10k+ company, but we're at the startup/growth stage, so there's less financial wiggle room." And same thing with industry.

Fair point, imo. That just makes the raise conversation more difficult because so much of the readily accessible info (Glassdoor, LinkedIn, industry reports, etc.) is too generic.

TL;DR having those breakdowns would be super valuable if there's enough data to be meaningful.
